column1: #Text=Kuvira 's already here and she brought her entire army .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " By this time tomorrow , my mother will have signed the treaty , and the Earth Empire will finally be united .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Do n't get ahead of yourself .
#Text=Securing your hometown wo n't be like every other city .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Zaofu stopped being my home long ago .
#Text=I 'm ready to take it by force .
#Text=The eyes of the world are on us now .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Do you really think we can rely on him ?
